metadata.Title: CVE-2012-6615 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: The ff_ass_split_override_codes function in libavcodec/ass_split.c inFFmpeg before 1.0.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(NULL pointer dereference and crash) via a subtitle dialog without text.

criterions.comment: mythtv: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
vice: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
gst-libav1.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
qtwebengine-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
